content: the necklace the blue stone is made by 2 overlapped knots flower hook 2 0 work tight start with orange yarn r1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 5 change to pink yarn r2 chain 2 1 double_crochet in 2nd loop from hook sl in the next st of r1 x 5 fo sew the flower to the hair of the doll 15 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts ​ https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs congratulations your moana is ready don t forget to send me a picture and tag me / give me credits / use my hashtag when posting online all info is in the licence look at the differences with my previous version… and remember it s worth it to keep practicing 16
